heroes.name: npc_dota_hero_skywrath_mage
heroes.bio_loc:
作为苍白之巢王庭的高阶法师，扎贡纳斯的人生非常矛盾。他生来宣誓保护荆棘王座的主人，但是对现在的天怒女王又痛恨得咬牙切齿。身为出身名门的年轻人，他与荆棘王座的第一继承人，天怒皇族的长公主仙德尔莎曾是亲密无间的伙伴。他对她浓烈的爱意至死不渝，不过出于自身的身份，他全身心投入到奥术的学习中，努力去掌握天怒一族的法术。

由于痴迷于奥术，他没有发现王庭有人密谋背叛仙德尔莎，错失阻止阴谋的机会。王庭的暴力政变瞬息而过，等他在如山的魔法书前抬起头来，他发现挚爱的老友已经无处寻觅。荆棘王座现在被仙德尔莎心肠歹毒的妹妹霸占，而扎贡纳斯无能为力。天怒法师拥有的魔力只会在他保护天怒皇族时才能施展，所以奋起反抗荆棘王座只会让他力量全无。他坚守自己的岗位，相信总有一天他的真爱将回到应有的王位上。天怒法师的秘密只有女神丝奎奥克知晓。而正是丝奎奥克施展了法术让仙德尔莎残破的肉体变成了复仇能量的化身。

在他梦想着让深爱的女王重返苍白之巢时，他更渴望让仙德尔莎重获健全的肉体。天性品行高尚，宅心仁厚的他侍奉王庭时阳奉阴违的举动让自己苦恼不已；但最要命的是，想象着复仇之魂内心因为立场的对立而对他无比憎恨，他痛彻心扉。
heroes.hype_loc: 无比致命又异常脆弱，天怒法师操控强大的魔法对敌人发动狂轰滥炸，将他们快速消灭。敌人经他沉默后对魔法全无抵抗，也就是说谁敢反抗他都会被轻而易举地汽化。
heroes.npe_desc_loc: 对单个目标施放高额魔法伤害的法术

abilities.name: skywrath_mage_arcane_bolt
abilities.desc_loc: Skywrath Mage launches a slow-moving bolt of arcane magic, dealing damage to an enemy unit based on Skywrath Mage's intelligence.
abilities.lore_loc: Within the Ghastly Eyrie's endless intrigue, only the clever and calm can hope to survive.
notes_loc: The projectile moves very slowly (500 ms), providing 325 vision around it.  Upon impact, it will reveal the target area for 3.34 seconds.
abilities.shard_loc: When Skywrath Mage casts Arcane Bolt, %total_bolt_count% bolts are created, one aimed at the original target, and the other at a random enemy within %extra_bolt_search_radius% range of the original target. Heroes will take priority.
abilities.scepter_loc: When Skywrath Mage casts Arcane Bolt, %total_bolt_count% bolts are created, one aimed at the original target, and the rest - at random enemies within %extra_bolt_search_radius% range of the original target. Heroes will take priority.

abilities.name: skywrath_mage_concussive_shot
abilities.desc_loc: Skywrath Mage sets off a long range shot that hits the closest hero within a long range.  Upon impact, it deals damage and slows in an area of effect.
abilities.lore_loc: Those who serve the court of the Ghastly Eyrie are ever locked in covert war. One must always know where danger lurks nearest.
notes_loc: If no enemy heroes are in range or they are in fog, Concussive Shot targets the nearest enemy creep.
Damages creeps around the impact area.
Provides 400 vision around the projectile, and reveals the target area for 3.34 seconds upon impact.
abilities.scepter_loc: When Skywrath Mage casts Concussive Shot, a different random target within %scepter_radius% range of the original target will be hit with the same ability. Heroes will take priority.

abilities.name: skywrath_mage_ancient_seal
abilities.desc_loc: Skywrath Mage seals the targeted unit with an ancient rune, silencing it and causing it to take additional damage from spells.
abilities.lore_loc: A holy incantation, whosoever finds themselves touched by Avilliva's sigil must suffer in penitent silence.
notes_loc: The magic damage resistance reduction doesn't affect creeps.
abilities.shard_loc: Ancient Seal debuff now causes other debuffs applied to last 50%% longer. Grants vision over the target.
abilities.scepter_loc: Anytime Skywrath Mage casts Ancient Seal, a different random target within %scepter_radius% range of the original target will be affected by the same ability. Heroes will take priority.

abilities.name: skywrath_mage_mystic_flare
abilities.desc_loc: Skywrath Mage uses his ultimate magical ability to conjure a precise and violent mystical field that lays waste to his adversaries. Deals massive damage distributed evenly among any Heroes in the area over %duration% seconds.
abilities.lore_loc: Only the most practiced of Skywrath sorcerers could hope to shape the skies into such a storm.
notes_loc: Mystic Flare only affects Heroes; it does not damage illusions or creep heroes.
Spell immune enemies do not count toward the damage distribution.
Mystic Flare will damage enemy creeps if no enemy heroes are present.
abilities.scepter_loc: When Skywrath Mage casts Mystic Flare, another Mystic Flare will be created on the position of a different random target enemy within %scepter_radius% range of the original target. Heroes will take priority.

facets.description_loc: Skywrath Mage gains a magic damage barrier when dealing damage to heroes.
facets.name: skywrath_mage_shield

facets.description_loc: Skywrath Mage's Cooldowns are reduced when he deals spell damage to enemy heroes.
facets.name: skywrath_mage_staff

abilities.name: skywrath_mage_shield_of_the_scion
abilities.desc_loc: Every time Skywrath Mage deals magic damage to an enemy hero with an ability, he gains a magic damage barrier equal to %damage_barrier_base% + %damage_barrier_per_level% per his hero level. Each buff stacks independently.

abilities.name: skywrath_mage_staff_of_the_scion
abilities.desc_loc: Every time Skywrath Mage deals magic damage to an enemy hero with an ability, he reduces all his ability cooldowns by %cooldown_reduction%s.
